title: Programme Funded by the Local Banks for the rehabilitation of National Highways through domestic contractors
decision_details: - the proposal made by H.E. The President, in his capacity as the Minister of Ports and Highways, to include all National Highways approved for rehabilitation under one list under this programme and select them to be developed on a priority basis; to call for technical and financial proposals from domestic contractors for the rehabilitation of 716.51 km of such roads; and to obtain funds for the purpose through local banks with Treasury guarantees, was approved by the Cabinet.
